article.title: Design_Science_License
article.paragraph: Design Science License(DSL) is acopyleftlicense forfree contentsuch as text, images, music and other content but not for documentation or source code. The DSL was written by Michael Stutz.cite webhttp://www.linuxtoday.com/developer/2001072600120PS2001-07-26Generalized "Copyleft" License Brings Open Source Beyond SoftwareMichael StutzLinux Today
